articles.author: Federica Di Sario
articles.title: France, Germany ask their citizens to quit Iran amid growing risk of military escalation in Mideast - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: U.N. Secretary-General António Guterres asked for “an immediate cessation” of the hostilities, adding that “neither the region nor the world can afford another war.”
articles.content:
It also restated that French citizens should absolutely refrain from traveling to Iran, Lebanon, Israel and Palestine.

articles.title: WATCH: Astronaut shows around International Space Station in this VIRAL video - WION
articles.description: A European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut recently provided a virtual tour of the International Space Station (ISS) to the public. The ISS, the largest space station ever built, orbits low Earth and is managed collaboratively by five space agencies: NASA, JAXA,…
